title: Riot should add a book emote!
body:
Nothing feels better than mechanically outplaying your opponent because you knew exactly what they were going to do.
Instead of flashing my “clean” emote. I’d much rather prefer something that shows I calculated everything.

Riot should add something like Ryze reading a scroll for another emote. Or perhaps some other champion that was reading intently.
It would be even better if one the title of the book it said “You.” Referring to your now dead opponent.
